record.description: Tall coryphées in pink are just a few of the pretty dancers and quick-talking footlight stars who will appear in the eleventh annual Revue [presented by] Mirror, the women’s dramatic organization at the University of Chicago, the evenings of March 6 and 7 in Mandel Hall. Mirror's diversified garden of beauty includes, left to right: Harriet Doll, Jean Gayton (daughter of city engineer Loran D. Gayton), and Virginia Clark.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
